abstract: Los Angeles Angels trade shortstop Erick Aybar and two pitching prospects to Atlanta Braves for shortstop Andrelton Simmons.
lead_paragraph: In his first major move with his new team, Billy Eppler acquired Andrelton Simmons from the Braves in exchange for the veteran shortstop Erick Aybar and two top pitching prospects.

headline.main: Angels’ New General Manager Makes a Big Pickup With Andrelton Simmons
headline.print_headline: Angels’ New General Manager Makes a Big Pickup at Short

snippet: In his first major move with his new team, Billy Eppler acquired Andrelton Simmons from the Braves in exchange for the veteran shortstop Erick Aybar and two top pitching prospects.
